resources.string: Without these permissions Collect can\'t access your forms or save answers. Reopen the app when you are ready to grant them.
Without these permissions Collect can\'t record your location. Please try again when you are ready to grant them.
Without this permission Collect can\'t access the camera. Please try again when you are ready to grant it.
Without this permission Collect can\'t access the microphone. Please try again when you are ready to grant it.
Without this permission Collect can\'t access accounts. Please try again when you are ready to grant it.
Without this permission Collect can\'t send SMS messages. Please try again when you are ready to grant it.
ODK Collect does not make calls but it needs to access certain properties about your device such as the phone number and device ID.
